mapper.select: SELECT t.`id`,t.`name`,t.`createDate`,t.`totalScore`,t.`person`,t.`subject`,t.`exam`,t.`examCode`,t.`examDate` FROM examInformation t where t.id = #{id};
mapper.update: UPDATE examInformation SET examInformation.name = #{name},examInformation.subject = #{subject},examInformation.examDate = #{examDate} WHERE examInformation.id = #{id};
